amendment.description: Amendment sought to ban political contributions in Federal elections by all individuals not citizens or nationals of the United States.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 34 printed in the Congressional Record of February 12, 2002 to prohibit any non-citizen from contributing to a federal campaign.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wicker amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 160 - 268 (Roll no. 30).
